segments.text: The water is just flowing over the edge, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in it, but she doesn’t even seem to feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just chaotic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone is going to get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
